TopicTitle: In Search of User with Randall Munroe Quote Signature

Articles.Content: Hey guys, im currently working on a speech of why we should continue to fund, and fund more, our space programs for my communications class, and to close it off, i though i should end with a quote, when i remembered seeing a use on here with a quote by Randall Munroe on the topic, however, i couldn't remember the person, or the quote. So, if you are, or happen to know this person, posting so would be very appreciated.

I don't know the person, but the quote is here: http://xkcd.com/893/

Hover over the image for a bit
